instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1708: What is A1708? A1708 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2017, 2016 with EMC 3164, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00840, 820-00875..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 820 - 00840 intermittent battery issues / connection problem
threads.message:
I've been sent in a 820 - 00840 that looks completely fine. 

No prior attempted repairs or water damage etc. 

Intermittent working from battery. 

Getting "no charging" message even though it's plugged into charger - sitting at 1%

Only pulling .200 - 600amp during boot and operation.

Sometimes it's fine, but most of the time it's not. 

Unsure what to do as everything is intermittent, any help is appreciated with this one

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 820 - 00840 intermittent battery issues / connection problem
threads.message: Does it always start and works correctly with charger, without battery?
